law.text: As used in this section, the term “final” shall mean that: (1) there is no pending hearing or appeal under section 39 to 42, inclusive, from a decision determining that an individual knowingly and willfully failed to furnish information; (2) no hearing or appeal from a decision on ineligibility for benefits is pending; (3) no request for waiver pursuant to subsection (c) of section 69 is pending; (4) no request for a redetermination pursuant to section 71 is pending; and (5) from a determination of overpayment, an opportunity for an interview and all appeal rights have been exhausted or not taken within the time allowed by law.
